attributes.action: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to recommend the Queen to award a knighthood (or whatever alternative honour she may deem appropriate) to David Warner for his outstanding contributions to the acting profession and entertainment for over 40 years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is not the forum for this request, please see -  http://www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
